entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. 60 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the evening. Periods of rain or snow beginning late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
